detail.description:
Pwede fast basta Pedicash!

Requirements:
Any functioning smartphone
PediCash App
One (1) Valid ID

How do I Apply?
Download the PediCash App
Go through the quick registration process
Verify your identity
Wait for approval

What do I need to register?
Upload one (1) VALID ID
NO OTHER REQUIREMENTS NEEDED

How are your privacy and permissions policies?

Pedicash values your privacy. The submitted photo of your government-issued ID and other personal information will be used to verify your credit profile on our system. We will NEVER share any of your information without your direct consent or explicit permission.

On the app, we will require the following permissions to verify your identity:
Location Access - To auto-verify your address.
Contacts Access - To easily nominate your contact references.
Camera Access - To scan your ID to complete ID verification

How safe are my personal details?
All personal details are fully secure and protected
Data privacy agreements are insisted upon registering
Routine assessments are done to ensure quality data protection

How and how fast can I receive the cash?
Approval of loan application can take upto 5 minutes to 24 hours
Upon approval, expect same-day disbursement through Skypay
Cash-out centers: RD Pawnshop and M Lhuillier
Other withdrawal channels: Bank Transfer, GCash or Coins.ph

How do I repay my loan?
Payment can be partial or in full, as long as it is within the loan period
You may check your loan term duration on the app
Pay through our select payment channels ONLY: RD Pawnshop, M Lhuillier, 7-Eleven, True Money, EC Pay and GCash

What loan term packages do you offer?

We offer a variety of packages depending on your VIP Level
Loan Amount: Php 2,000 - Php 20,000
Loan Duration: 60 - 120 days
Maximum APR: 20%
Transaction fee: Php 0 - Php 150
Other fees: Service fee from 10-20%


PRODUCT INFORMATION
-Amount:₱3,000-₱30,000
-Term: 90days-360 days
-Service fee: 3%-5%
-Transfer Fee: ₱0-₱200
-APR: 18%


Example:
Loan Amount: ₱ 20,000
Loan Term:180-days
with Interest rate: 18%
Transfer fee:  ₱ 0
Service fee is ₱ 600
Total service fee and interest will be ₱ 2,400 pesos.
Total received amount is ₱19,400
No monthly payment
Total repayment for 180 days is ₱ 21,800 (20,000*18%/360*180+20,000) only pay  on the due date.


*Reminder: always check the fees, charges and terms and conditions of your loan offer before accepting your loan.





Why choose Pedicash?

Pedicash offers all the basic features available in any other app:
Simple and straightforward application process
Multiple layers of account security
Fast and reliable cash disbursement
Regular events and promos

What sets Pedicash apart from any other loaning app is that our upward movement is faster than any other app. Using our app allows you to increase your VIP level with just a few loan applications, giving you:
Increased Loan Amounts
Increased Loan Durations
Lower Processing Fees

What are you waiting for? Download the APP now and be part of our Pedicash Family!


Contact Us
Pedicash is one of the newest Micro-Lending applications catered to giving Filipinos a quick and reliable loaning experience. Pwede Fast Basta Pedicash!
For questions, feedbacks, or concerns, please contact us at:
Website: www.pedicash.ph
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pedicashph
Email: info@pedicash.ph

Please visit us on our FB page for the latest updates to the PediCash FAQs

All loans under the PediCash App are financed by Fund Quest Lending Services Corporation, with SEC Registration (under processing)
